ED_Title: Comprehensive  review of the whole question of peacekeeping operations in all their aspects
ED_DecisionText: At its 49th plenary meeting, on 9 December 2021, the General Assembly took note of the report of the Special Political and Decolonization Committee (Fourth Committee). (Footnote: A/76/418)
ED_Disclaimer: The final version of decisions adopted during the main part of the session will be contained in document A/76/49 (Vol. II) after editorial review.
